tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Guilt
programme.desc: When Captain Huddleston hears that the marine corporal has been charged with rape, he sends Lt. Colonel Sarah Mac MacKenzie to handle the case in a hot zone of Anti-American activity.

programme.title: JAG: Mixed Messages
programme.desc: An intruder shoots three Navy people, killing two. One of the dead is a friend of Harm, who protects his reputation. Webb, counter-espionage, and disinformation are involved; Bud solves it. Mac and Renee return to town; Mac leaves again.

programme.title: JAG: Ambush
programme.desc: Capt. Shepard leads his troop off its peacekeeping mission and into battle with the colonel of the rebel forces. Consequently, six marines die in the public incident. Harm is sent in to investigate despite a recent touch of bad luck in a string of trials.

programme.title: JAG: Jag-a-thon
programme.desc: The JAG gang takes part in a JAGathon, a charity-benefit marathon, which provides opportunities for personal pride and individual competitiveness. Sturgis feels uncertain, and Harm defends a sailor for impersonating an officer.

programme.title: JAG: The Mission
programme.desc: A spotter on the ground calls for an airstrike as he has identified 15 heavily armed suspected Al Qaeda members on horseback. JAG won’t approve the airstrike until the spotter is absolutely certain the men are Al Qaeda members.

programme.title: JAG: Defending His Honor
programme.desc: An ambulance pulls up to a crash site where a woman, Jennifer Wilson, is found injured and crying for her baby. Unbeknownst to her, the six-month-old baby died in the accident. A Navy judge stands accused of vehicular homicide.

programme.title: JAG: In Country
programme.desc: Central Command coordinates an airstrike on a confirmed target traveling through Afghanistan. After the strike is launched, marine troops assess the damage and they are disturbed to learn that they targeted the wrong vehicle and hit civilians instead.

programme.title: JAG: Enemy Below
programme.desc: Kabir is preparing an attack against the U.S. and was last seen crossing the border from Afghanistan to Iran. He is believed to have recruited Capt. Yerastov, a Russian submarine captain. Turner, Harm and Mac help in the hunt for the terrorists.

programme.title: JAG: Critical Condition
programme.desc: Bud has lost his right lower leg due to a mine in Afghanistan; during emergency surgery he faces bad trouble. Sturgis returns to Washington, and Harm and Mac disobey an order from the admiral. Bud encounters an astounding change of course.

programme.title: JAG: Dangerous Game
programme.desc: A deputy sheriff dies while chasing a car carrying two SEALs in a Navy exercise. The driver stands trial for negligent homicide.

programme.title: JAG: In Thin Air
programme.desc: Lt. Albrecht and Lt. Cmdr. Zuzello make Zuzello’s farewell flight before he retires. All is fine until Albrecht notices that his partner is passed out from hypoxia. Albrecht makes an emergency landing on the ship.Harm is sent to the ship to investigate.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Shorthanded
programme.desc: Team Scorpion heads to Las Vegas for a simple casino job, but a robbery leads to Walter's arrest and the rest of the team is left to clear his name.

programme.title: Scorpion: Plutonium Is Forever
programme.desc: To fix a Los Angeles nuclear reactor that's on the verge of a cataclysmic meltdown, Walter and the team must reluctantly enlist the help of a troubled former member.

programme.title: Scorpion: True Colors
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must pass a mandated psych evaluation or face being disbanded after they're accused of destroying a priceless work of art in an attempt to protect an art exhibit.

programme.title: Scorpion: Father's Day
programme.desc: A case gets personal for Team Scorpion when three convicts break out of prison and one of them is a brilliant hacker who was forced to help the others steal billions online.

programme.title: Scorpion: Risky Business
programme.desc: Team Scorpion enlists the help of a musician who created a controversial algorithm that generates hit songs to help find the murderer of a music blogger.

programme.title: Scorpion: Rogue Element
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must help protect Cabe's ex-wife after she uncovers evidence that suggests foul play in the death of a prominent congressman.

programme.title: Scorpion: Talismans
programme.desc: When a military plane is shot down in Bosnia, Team Scorpion must help recover its stealth technology before it falls into enemy hands.

programme.title: Scorpion: Revenge
programme.desc: When Sylvester accidentally triggers an explosive device during an investigation, Team Scorpion must focus on finding who's responsible even while their friend's life hangs in the balance.

programme.title: Scorpion: Dominoes
programme.desc: As Christmas approaches, Team Scorpion races to find a way to save a young boy's life after he gets trapped in a beachside cave and drowning is imminent.

programme.title: Scorpion: Kill Screen
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must help Ralph when the FBI questions him after his dark web game play inadvertently reveals the location of a CIA safe house and results in the murder of CIA operatives.

programme.title: Scorpion: Charades
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is tasked with uncovering a mole inside the CIA whose judgment is clouded by matters of the heart and is being coerced into stealing deadly chemicals.

programme.title: Scorpion: Forget Me Nots
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must jog the memory of an injured former Secret Service agent who is their only hope of preventing weapons of mass destruction being launched from a secret U.S. nuclear silo.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: The Kids Are Not Alright
programme.desc: Andy has her sights set on a much-needed long weekend. But when a routine highway check leads to the discovery of a teenage boy in the trunk of a car, Andy and Gail must convince him that no heartache lasts forever.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Poison Pill
programme.desc: After a messy drug arrest, Andy and Marlo are quarantined together. Meanwhile, 15 Division springs into emergency response mode in order to get the contaminated drugs off the streets before a deadly outbreak sweeps through the city.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Skeletons
programme.desc: When a young woman is reported missing, the officers of 15 Division soon discover a possible copycat connection to one of their division’s most distressing cases. With the clock ticking, Gail must face her worst fears..

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Friday the 13th
programme.desc: When human bones found in a ravine open up a 15-year-old missing persons case, Swarek reunites with his old training officer to solve the case.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: For Better, For Worse
programme.desc: Everyone at 15 Division, especially Andy, just wants a quick, smooth shift so they can get to Frank and Noelle’s wedding. But things get complicated when they get called to a hijacked casino bus full of senior citizens.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: What I Lost
programme.desc: When Chris returns for a visit, his reunion takes a shocking turn when his son, Christian, is abducted while under the care of Andy and Nick.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: You Are Here
programme.desc: Near the end of shift, 15 Division busts a marijuana grow-op – a case that becomes Traci’s first homicide and forces Andy, Nick and Gail to work overtime.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Deception
programme.desc: When a suspected pedophile is found beaten within an inch of his life, Andy discovers Marlo has been conducting a mania-fueled, off-hours “investigation”.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Under Fire
programme.desc: After Andy and Chloe take fire from an unseen shooter, the officers realize they are the targets of someone with a grudge against 15 Division.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: You Can See the Stars
programme.desc: In the wake of a targeted attack on the officers of 15 Division (ep. 412), Andy, Swarek, and their fellow officers have to piece together the truth about a past crime in order to find Oliver Shaw – in time to save his life.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: The First Day of the Rest of Your Life
programme.sub-title: The First Day of the Rest of Your Life
programme.desc: When a mysterious young girl vanishes from the scene of a multi-car accident, Andy McNally connects the girl to a 7-year-old cold case.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Nunnington Hall Pt1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the upper floors of this large manor house that is said to be swarming with paranormal activity of every kind, and gets more than he bargained for.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Nunnington Hall Pt2
programme.desc: The creaky corridors and old rooms of Nunnington Hall have many stories of ghosts and phantoms, Stuart investigates the middle floors and starts to experience unexplained happenings.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Pen-Y-Lan House
programme.desc: Karl & Stuart investigate the top floor of this grand Welsh house. The stories of paranormal activity soon come to life as the duo are surrounded by strange occurrences.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Pen-Y-Lan House P1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the outbuildings of this large estate, where many people have witnessed strange occurrences, some he is about to witness first-hand.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Pen-Y-Lan House P2
programme.desc: Stuart investigates the main house alone, although it isn’t long before he feels something is there with him.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Ruthin Castle
programme.desc: Yvette & Karl investigate a jewel in the crown of Great Britain, Ruthin Castle. They take on the infamous room 222 and soon realise they are not alone.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Samlesbury Hall P1
programme.desc: With a history dating back to 1185, Salmesbury Hall is of the UK’s most historic buildings and said to be one of the most haunted. With ghost stories and sightings all over the building, Stuart investigates the ground floor.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Samlesbury Hall P2
programme.desc: Karl investigates the upper floors of this historic building dating back to 1185, and realises he is not alone.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Shrewsbury Prison
programme.desc: Abandoned prisons are always a daunting prospect and the Most Haunted team love them. This time Karl takes on HMP Shrewsbury alone and experiences some of the unhappy phantoms that lurk in the shadows.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Shrewsbury Prison
programme.desc: Yvette takes Karl, Stuart and Mary into the vast Shrewsbury Prison. A place riddled with paranormal activity of every kind.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Shrewsbury Prison Pt1
programme.desc: Yvette & Mary enter the vast expanse of the very haunted A-Wing on their own and soon start to regret their decision.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Shrewsbury Prison Pt2
programme.desc: With Yvette and Mary investigating A-Wing, Karl & Stuart take on the formidable C-Wing where the unhappy spirits of past residents are said to roam.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: York Castle Museum
programme.desc: The history of York Castle Museum is almost endless as are the paranormal stories attached to it. Karl enters the street and cells with dramatic effect.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Delapre Abbey
programme.desc: The team are joined by five members of the English rugby team as they investigate an all\nbut forgotten piece of British history.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Drakelow Tunnels
programme.desc: p 8: Drakelow Tunnels - Kidderminster: With over 4 miles of haunted tunnels the team have one night to investigate this labyrinth of horror.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 6
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Darker Learning
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS has been called to investigate Southern Vermont College in Bennington, Vermont. The legend of a mysterious love triangleand suicidescould be at the root of frightening paranormal activity.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 8
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Ghost Hasn't Left the Building
programme.sub-title: The Ghost Hasn't Left the Building
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, Amy is back! TAPS travels to Shreveport, Louisiana to investigate the historic Shreveport Auditorium, a place famous for introducing Elvis and other rock n' rolls stars to the world.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: A Ghost of a Marine
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads toMount Joy, Pennsylvania to help out the Great-Great Granddaughter of Alois Bube, the founder of Bube's Brewery.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Innocent Until Proven Dead
programme.desc: TAPS has been called to Louisville, Kentucky to help three descendants find out if their ancestors arestill inhabitingthe property they owned in the 1800's.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: An Officer and an Apparition
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS and 2 special guests investigate the Brunswick Old City Hall where an officer was shot and killedin the 1890's. Will TAPS discover that he's still on duty?

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Phantom For the First Course
programme.desc: A renowned restaurant, The Whitney, once owned by a lumber baron in the 1800's, might still have family members hanging around its halls. Renovations and construction around the property could be behind the uprising of spirits.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Andromeda: Last Call at the Broken Hammer
programme.sub-title: Last Call at the Broken Hammer
programme.desc: The crew looks for a long-lost Commonwealth leader who has gone into hiding.

programme.title: Andromeda: All Too Human
programme.desc: Dylan, Beka and Trance go with Rommie to find out about a weapon being developed on a planet that distrusts AI.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Andromeda is tasked with escorting medical ships safely through Drago-Kazov space.

programme.title: Andromeda: Home Fires
programme.desc: A planet of Commonwealth survivors led by Dylan's former fiancee is invited to join the new Commonwealth, but when they vote not to join, the Magog are suspected of playing dirty.

programme.title: Andromeda: Into the Labyrinth
programme.desc: An agent of the Abyss tries to lure Harper into joining the Magog.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: When they rescue a young prince from an uprising that kills the rest of his family, Dylan and Tyr are asked to be his advisors.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan and his new Commonwealth fleet take on the Drago-Kazov fleet but find it much larger than expected.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The Magog eggs in Harper are starting to hatch, so the team builds a Teseract machine.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan takes over a tourist barge in an attempt to escape mercenaries.

programme.title: Andromeda: Be All My Sins Remembered
programme.desc: A body identification goes awry when it turns out Beka's former crewmate isn't dead at all.

programme.title: Andromeda: Dance of the Mayflies
programme.desc: Andromeda rescues dying people from a drift, but they soon turn into zombies being controlled by a hive-mind.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.248
programme.desc: A woman and her mother sue their former friend for furniture return; he claims they owe him a loan. Another woman sues her son's ex-friend's mother for car impound costs.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.26
programme.desc: Intoxicated bride sues friend for face punch at wedding, accused teen claims self-defense/Woman accuses ex of cheating, he defends as moving on; dispute over living room set balance.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.94
programme.desc: A single mother dips into her savings to bail an ex-boyfriend out of jail after he was arrested for not paying child support.A woman sues her granddaughter for money she allegedly borrowed to pay for her prom.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.260
programme.desc: A young woman sues for damages after a catfight at a party. Another woman claims chest contusions from breaking up the fight and sues the man she alleges beat her up.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.128
programme.desc: While deployed in Iraq, a woman claims the father of her child had promised to take care of her car but damaged the vehicle instead/A fifty-dollar loan and unpaid rent land feuding ex-roommates in court.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.72
programme.desc: Teen maid of honor sued for failing wedding duties; new bride's father claims cost of missed event plane ticket. Earthquake interrupts courtroom during ex-lovers' case over stolen money allegedly used for drugs.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.229
programme.desc: A woman denies filing a retaliatory restraining order after finding her ex-fiancé with someone else; accused of kicking his bedroom door. Another woman sued for passing fraudulent check in secret-shopper scam.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.172
programme.desc: Man not father of child, sues mother for alleged loans. Jailed vegan seeks bailout due to prison food, friend demands repayment.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.119
programme.desc: Custody of a pit bull rescued from the pound is disputed by a man and his daughter; he says she abandoned the dog at his home/A woman sues her former friend for the cost of bailing her out of jail after she was arrested for false imprisonment.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.103
programme.desc: Threats to kill kittens, questionable remarks about a man’s sexuality and inappropriate, drunken toasts after the death of a child come into play when ex-friends fight over alleged vandalism.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.18
programme.desc: Teenagers steal car, vandalize junkyard; one pleads guilty, demands co-conspirator pay $15,000 fine/Woman sues ex for loan balance; he countersues for harassment/Woman seeks compensation for testifying against son's ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.70
programme.desc: Landlord countersues female tenant, alleging she and her teenage daughter were problem renters who trashed the apartment. Woman sues former friend and co-worker for loan to prevent home foreclosure; friend denies promising repayment.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.201
programme.desc: A woman sues her ex-stepdaughter for unpaid loan to pay traffic fines, alleging deceit. A teen in a hit-and-run says she was scammed by the victim.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.225
programme.desc: A violent breakup leads ex-lovers to dispute damages from an assault, hotel fees, and destroyed property. Allegations of infidelity arise as a woman sues her ex-boyfriend for unpaid furniture, countered with claims of her ongoing relationship.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.205
programme.desc: Eighteen-year-old ex-roommates quarrel over a cat fight, the cost to replace a mattress, and vet bills.\t\t\t\r\nA woman sues her niece for a series of loans she says she made to pay for living expenses.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.223
programme.desc: A woman accuses her ex-boyfriend of charging over $10,000 on her emergency credit card while she studied abroad in Germany. A man admits to stabbing an air mattress due to spilled beer, leading to a lawsuit by his girlfriend's ex-boyfriend for damages.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.204
programme.desc: A man sues his ex-boyfriend for an unpaid loan he says he made for bail; he is countersued for alleged harassment.\t\t\t\r\nEx-lovers, who accuse each other of infidelity, fight over $3,000 in credit card bills.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.165
programme.desc: Man sues ex over alleged false restraining order; denies gun threat. Mother with concerns about son's spending keeps his money.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.52
programme.desc: A woman sues her daughter’s schoolmate and her teen goddaughter for damages to her property and an ambulance bill, resulting from an assault.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.73
programme.desc: Teenager denies side-swiping mailbox, sues friend for car damage. Woman's arm broken during playful punch exchange with friend.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.114
programme.desc: Man faces assault charges after altercation with son/Ex-fiancé sued for rent and unpaid loans.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.170
programme.desc: $6,000 spent on a dog’s pacemaker and rattlesnake-bite medical bills are contested by a Good Samaritan animal rescuer who hated to see “Ginger” eventually put down.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.217
programme.desc: A woman's Disneyland trip after a concussion weakens her lost wages claim. Another woman discovers her fiancé's hidden child while he's incarcerated, leading to property disputes.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.80
programme.desc: Teenager left with mess and suspected vandalism by ex-roommate, involving seven-layer dip under mattress and thermostat set to 90 degrees. Woman sues ex-boyfriend for unpaid rent and share of vacation; he countersues, alleging she damaged door and wall.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: After a protein test challenge, the teams gear up for another stressful dinner service, this time attended by Gordon's mother Helen. One team finishes way in the lead, but which of the hopefuls will be taking the fall this week?

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams must herd farm animals into their proper pens and decide which proteins and starches they will use next.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: This time, the teams compete to create the best Italian opera-inspired dishes, with the winning team getting a shopping trip and a VIP dinner. Later, the teams provide dinner service for members of the Italian Consulate.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Fiery chef Gordon Ramsay puts two teams of aspiring chefs through a series of tough challenges. The teams meet new members before heading into a team challenge in which they must prepare a tasting menu for a dog show.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams roll the dice to determine the ingredients for their next team challenge, while a contestant leaves due to an injury. The cooks cater for music legends during dinner service, including Stewart Copeland and Steven Tyler.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Following the departure of two contestants from the competition, those remaining are challenged to create Indian-inspired meals, with the winning team earning a day of pampering at a luxurious spa.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay puts aspiring chefs through tough challenges. The teams are challenged to a blind taste test. Dinner service is held in honour of a group of decorated firefighters.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams are challenged to create their own amuse bouches, with the winners enjoying a helicopter ride to a luxury location and the losers preparing coconuts for dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams are tasked with creating mouthwatering steak dishes in a bid to impress Gordon and the owner of a renowned steak restaurant.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining chefs cater for 40 `glampers' before a hectic dinner service which leads to a difficult decision for the chefs and Gordon himself. Someone will have to pay the ultimate price and be forced to leave the competition at this late stage.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The four remaining chefs are reunited with their loved ones for a taste test, with the winner dining out with their family at a posh restaurant.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Kristen Flynn, the boss of Premiere Van Lines. She’s a woman with a formidable reputation. Her own staff call her “Frugal Flynn” because she watches the pennies to protect profit.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Tervita specializes in environmental clean-up for Western Canada’s booming energy and mining industries. It doesn’t take long for Fory Musser,.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Catherine Monson is the driving force behind Fastsigns which is America’s largest custom sign franchise company. During her journey, Catherine finds out it’s really the personal discoveries that make this experience a life-changing one.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dina Dwyer-Owens, the Chairwoman and CEO of The Dwyer Group, which is the parent company to a collection of franchise brands specializing in home and vehicle maintenance, goes undercover posing as a contestant on a show called Keep Your Day Job.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canada’s largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Canlan Ice Sports Corp is the largest private owner of sports facilities in North America. CEO Joey St Aubin admits their prices are higher than local municipal rinks, but believes his company offers a premium service and better ice quality.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Tigner, the president of Kendall-Jackson Wine Estates, the second largest family owned wine company in the world, goes undercover posing as a grocery store employee who is pursuing his dream job in the wine industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The CEO of Canadian restaurant chain East Side Mario’s finds out what it’s really like for the Average Joe when he steps away from financial management to spend a week working undercover in his own kitchens.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Bernt Bodal is the CEO of American Seafoods, one of the largest seafood companies in the United States. He is going undercover to look for ways for the company to grow.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Dad's Visit
programme.desc: Much to Audrey's dismay, Jeff's chauvinist father, who expects Audrey to wait on him hand and foot, extends his visit after spraining his ankle. Meanwhile, Russell has a one-night stand with a woman who won't leave his apartment.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Russell's Secret
programme.desc: Audrey discovers that Russell is a closeted fan of Broadway musicals, a fact she promises to keep secret in exchange for free theater tickets. Meanwhile, Adam and Jennifer take dancing lessons in preparation for their wedding.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Twice
programme.desc: When Audrey becomes jealous of a pregnant co-worker, she inadvertently convinces her colleagues that she has a bundle of joy on the way too.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Lyin' King
programme.desc: Things quickly get complicated when Audrey and Jeff decide to ditch a dinner date with Jennifer and Adam in order to attend Brad and Jackie's exclusive, celebrity packed party.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Family Style
programme.desc: When Audrey plans a dinner date with Jeff, Jackie (Guest Star Sam Harris) and Brad (Guest Star Orlando Jones), Jeff feels extremely violated when Jackie begins eating off his plate!

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Sex Toy Story
programme.desc: When Jennifer and Audrey throw a 'girls only' sex party, Jeff quickly gets insecure when he finds a 'product' Audrey may have purchased.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: House Money
programme.desc: When Jennifer and Russell decide to teach Adam a lesson in responsibility, the joke is on them when Adam has the last laugh.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: May Divorce Be With You
programme.desc: When Audrey invites her and Jeff's recently divorced out of luck friend Steve to stay with them for a few days, Audrey thinks she may have become Steve's newest rebound.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Poaching Timmy
programme.desc: When Timmy grows tired of dealing with Russell's demeaning demands and Audrey has had it with her terrible assistant, the two find a possible solution in working together. Meanwhile, Jeff tries to recreate the conditions that led to a Giants win.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Old Timer's Day
programme.desc: Jeff tries to prove to Audrey he's young and spry and invites her to watch him play softball. While up at bat, a simple sneeze throws his back out, but he insists on playing in the tournament game.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Challenge
programme.desc: When Jeff, Russell, and Adam make a bet to see who would be able to score the soonest, the three put their thinking caps on and rise up to the challenge.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Flirting
programme.desc: On the advice of Russell, Jack's flirtation with a colleague at work reveals that she's more than happy to have an affair. Russell, realizing he left his phone at the home of a one-night stand, sends Timmy to find it.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Four Pillars
programme.desc: To make Audrey happy, Jeff begrudgingly agrees to see a couple's therapist. Meanwhile, Russell develops a crush on Timmy's fiancé.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Ghost Story
programme.desc: Audrey is upset when Jeff reveals to her that he does not believe she saw her dead grandmother's ghost. Meanwhile, Russell tries to persuade Timmy not to go through with his arranged marriage.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Indian Giver
programme.desc: Audrey is surprised by Jeff's sudden interest in her favorite reality show until she discovers the reason. Meanwhile, to Russell's delight, Timmy has second thoughts about his impending arranged marriage.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: 3rd Wheel
programme.desc: Unbeknownst to Jeff, Audrey lies to her homely friend Liz that she is on Jeff's list of women he would sleep with if Audrey were not around.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Snoozin' For A Bruisin'
programme.desc: When Jeff and Audrey switch sides of the bed, Jeff accidentally rolls over and clocks Audrey in the face, landing her in the hospital.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Reunion
programme.desc: Audrey attends her high school reunion intent on proving to her former classmates how great her life is in New York City. Meanwhile, Russell accidentally ruins Timmy's dinner party.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Free Free Time
programme.desc: When Audrey's weekly girls' night out is canceled, Jeff seeks out time alone; however, his plans are foiled every step of the way. Meanwhile, Russell discovers that Timmy has a lot of pent-up aggression toward him.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Score
programme.desc: Jeff spends the evening trying to avoid learning the score of a Rangers game after Audrey forces him to give up his tickets and go to her boss' party instead. Meanwhile, at the game, Russell is mortified when Timmy roots against the home team.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Atlantic City
programme.desc: Audrey tries to make Jeff feel guilty for not telling her that his friend's bachelor party in Atlantic City was canceled; however, her plan backfires when Jeff discovers that Audrey is also being deceitful.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Harassment
programme.desc: A new employee with an axe to grind against Audrey files a sexual harassment claim against her. Meanwhile, after being teased for playing cricket, Timmy challenges Jeff to a game to prove the sport is not for wimps.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Thief Who Stole Christmas
programme.desc: It's Christmas day, and Dog sets out to nab Raymond, who robs to support his ice habit, and give him a little Christmas gift - shiny new handcuffs.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rock-a-Bye Bounty
programme.desc: Dog and Beth must go after their former housekeeper, Lisa, who's jumped bond. They know this case will be tricky because Lisa knows everyone in the family. Luckily, Beth's nephew, Jason, is visiting and is quickly put to work as the bait.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Father-Hood
programme.desc: Before Tim heads out for a tough day of bounty hunting, he likes to get in a little quality time with his daughter, Summer Rain.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cops and Criminals
programme.desc: After giving a rousing speech to an audience of enthusiastic grade-schoolers, Dog catches up with an old friend, Sheriff Tommy Cayetano, to talk business. Dog's got a tough fugitive, named Mia, to catch and Tommy is happy to lend a hand.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cupid in Cuffs
programme.desc: It's the day before Valentine's Day and love is in the air at Da Kine Bail Bonds--but not for Tapi who has failed to appear in court on theft charges. Dog's plan is to have Leland knock on Tapi's door with a Valentine's gift to draw her out.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bonds of Love
programme.desc: Dog and Beth are finally getting married! They've been together for more than ten years but Dog is determined, as he puts it, to "marry his common law wife the Christian way.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Love and to Cherish
programme.desc: Dog and Beth are off to the Big Island for their wedding. They hope to relax for a few days but it turns out Leland has a fugitive he needs to catch and despite the time limit, neither Dog nor Beth can resist the opportunity to catch a fugitive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bustin' with Justin
programme.desc: Dog and the team must deal with misleading informants, belligerent boaters, and angry drunks when they go after Kimberly, a traffic offender with over 20 violations. And if that isn't enough, Dog has another problem - Duane Lee is sick.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Run Fugitive, Run
programme.desc: When the team hunts for Steven, a fugitive with a history of domestic abuse, they seek help from his girlfriend, who's been a victim of his abuse. Meanwhile, Beth trains for a 5K race to help raise awareness about domestic abuse.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Vegas or Bust
programme.desc: Dog is going to be the keynote speaker at the annual Profession Bail Agents convention in Las Vegas, but before he leaves he's got to clear two cases from his docket - Heidi and Stephanie.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Playing Possum
programme.desc: Tim's got a big problem. Owen has failed to appear in court. He's on bond for serious drug charges and now Tim could lose $30,000 if he doesn't catch Owen. With Dog's help he tries to track down the co-signer but they come up dry.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rainy Day Woman
programme.desc: It's been raining for days and the team is going a little stir crazy, but Dog has the cure; a good hunt. Maui has failed to appear on a drug charge and the team has just one lead. She was recently spotted during a bust at a local chop shop garage.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Ticket to Ride
programme.desc: Dog decides it's time to outfit the Da Kine crew with new SUVs. After a quick visit to their local dealership, they go after Jasmine, a woman whose criminal record includes over 37 arrests for everything from drug promotion to assault.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mother Knows Best
programme.desc: Dog has two fugitives to catch, and he gets help from the unlikeliest sources - the fugitives' mothers. First, Ginger's mother wants to revoke her daughter's bond. Then, Brandon's mother decides to revoke his bond because Brandon has an ice habit.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Irons in the Fire
programme.desc: Dog is back hunting in the big city of Denver, but chasing fugitives on the mainland is more dangerous than ever. So Dog decides that the crew should get pepper-ball guns, which have much better range than pepper spray.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rocky Mountain Roundup
programme.desc: Dog decides to help two of his bondsmen buddies, Dave "Red" Widhelm and "Downtown" Bobby Brown. First up is Red, who has a client, named Alvin, whose bond is $20,000. Then the team goes after Craig, a client of Bobby's whose bond is almost $70,000.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: This One's For You
programme.desc: Dog leads the team on another adrenaline-filled chase in Denver. The fugitive, Robert, has a habit of address-hopping that makes him a difficult target, but Dog refuses to give up and finally tracks Robert down in his latest hideaway.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Baby Lyssa Steps Up
programme.desc: The team is still in Colorado, and today Dog starts his day by to giving his kids and crew a sample of their western heritage by taking them horseback riding. This hunt takes Dog back to his old stomping grounds in Denver.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Running on Empty
programme.desc: Dog's time is running out in Colorado. After a month of helping his bail bondsmen friends around Denver, he's got to get his family back home to Hawaii. But Dog wants one more capture before they leave.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Inside Out
programme.desc: Dog kickstarts the search for Jackson, a 240lbs, six feet tall bad boy who has skipped out on a $10,000 bond. Jackson’s apparently at his father-in-law's house, but the father-in-law has info about Jackson that brings Dog to a unique hideout.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Heroes Welcome
programme.desc: In this special episode, the Duck Commander team surprises two wounded veterans with a trip to Monroe so they can be in an episode of Duck Dynasty. To show their support, the Robertson family stages a color run to bring awareness to our wounded soldiers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Pie Hard
programme.desc: Willie and Alan agree to help Miss Kay open her own bakery, but things take a turn when Kay is asked to hand over her secret recipes. Meanwhile, the guys in the duck call room take an extended lunch break by driving to Mississippi.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Van He'llsing
programme.desc: When Missy and Jase's son Reed purchases an old van to boost his music career, his parents begin to question some of his choices. Meanwhile, Willie helps Jep prepare River for a competitive wrestling league by introducing him to his friend.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Toad to Perdition
programme.desc: When Willie and his brothers spend too much time frog hunting, their wives challenge them to a "frogging" competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: RV There Yet?
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a road trip to Liberty University where they will drop off John Luke and Mary Kate for their first year of college. Along the way, they stop in Nashville to visit Willie's friend Colt Ford.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie & Korie's Anniversorry
programme.desc: The Robertson family throws a party for Willie & Korie's 25th anniversary, but things take a dramatic turn when Willie and Korie reveal a big secret. Meanwhile, when Jase blames Uncle Si for getting him a parking ticket.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Statue of Imitations
programme.desc: When Willie asks a local chainsaw artist to make him a statue, he gets a big surprise when it's revealed that the statue is of an unlikely subject - Willie himself. Meanwhile, Jep and Jessica attempt to help Kay with her hoarding.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Decent Proposal
programme.desc: On a trip to New York, Jase's son Reed proposes to his girlfriend, which inspires his father to fan the flames of romance back home with Missy. Meanwhile, Sadie asks Willie to be a guest lecturer at her business class.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Father Knows Pest
programme.desc: The tables are turned when the HOA comes to Jase for help to rid the neighborhood of a menacing beaver. Little Will has just gotten his learner's permit, and Willie and Si argue over which of them is the better driving instructor.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Wild Wild West Monroe
programme.desc: When Jase and Jep get into an argument over which of them is the rightful heir to their grandfather's old rifle, they decide to settle the argument with a marksmanship contest. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie help Rebecca prepare for her trip to Taiwan.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Half in the Bag
programme.desc: After Si has started moonlighting as a grocery bagger, the guys show up at the store and their teasing inadvertently causes Si to lose his job and his chance to enter a local bagging competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: There Will Be Flood
programme.desc: When a large storm hits Monroe, most of the adults head to Phil and Kay's to help protect their house from flooding while Jess, Sadie, Rebecca and Cole babysit the kids. Meanwhile, Jep, Si, Martin and Godwin try to protect the Duck Commander.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bingo Star
programme.desc: Willie accompanies Kay to a local bingo tournament and gets seduced by the game, eventually embarrassing himself and Kay with his enthusiasm.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sadie's Choice
programme.desc: Willie takes Sadie on a tour of a local college in hopes of convincing her to stay nearby after her impending high school graduation.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Children of the Cornbread
programme.desc: When the Robertson brothers debate which of their wives makes the best cornbread, it escalates into a full-on cornbread cook off. Meanwhile, when Jep, Martin, and Godwin play a practical joke on Uncle Si, it ends up being Si who has the last laugh.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Whole Lotta Bull
programme.desc: The guys enjoy a one-day rodeo fantasy camp where they learn the ins and outs of riding, roping and clowning.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Comes the Son
programme.desc: After leaving school to pursue music, Jase feels that Reed needs some structure in his life, so he hires him to take his place at Duck Commander.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bro'd Trip
programme.desc: Jase accompanies Willie on a business trip to Arkansas to pitch a new product and has unorthodox sales strategies. Back in Monroe, Jep and Si have to track down an important item of Willie's that they accidentally shipped out.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie thinks his kids have been spending too much time on their phones and other devices so he initiates a "No-Tech Week," but when he has to participate too it ends up being harder than he thought. There's a lice outbreak at Duck Command.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The West Monroe Wing
programme.desc: Willie and Jase run against each other to become president of their neighborhood HOA. Jep, Jess and Miss Kay work on a Duck Commander themed display for the local zoo.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Automation Frustration
programme.desc: Willie buys a 3D printer for the office that starts off as a fun distraction for the guys until it appears the printer could soon replace their jobs. Si is upset that Willie invested in the 3D printer and didn't give him a raise.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Razing the Snakes
programme.desc: Jase, Jep, Si and Cole try to fight back a growing population of cottonmouth snakes on Phil's property. Meanwhile, Willie uses his business expertise to help Rebecca improve her clothing store.(n)

programme.title: Donovan's Echo
programme.desc: A series of uncanny déjà vu events force a man to re-examine his tragic past, memory, instinct, and future.

programme.title: Queen of Outer Space
programme.desc: American astronauts are drawn by a mysterious force to the planet Venus, which they find to be inhabited only by beautiful women and their despotic queen.

programme.title: Robot Apocalypse
programme.desc: When expert hacker Tara tries to stop a powerful, sentient A.I. as it takes over the world's military, the A.I. marks her as a terrorist.

programme.title: The Philadelphia Experiment
programme.desc: A United States Navy destroyer escort participates in a Navy "invisibility" experiment that inadvertently sends two sailors forty years into the future. Starring: Michael Paré, Nancy Allen, Eric Christmas.

programme.title: Above the Shadows
programme.desc: Starring Olivia Thirlby, Alan Ritchson, Jim Gaffigan, Maria Dizzia, Tito Ortiz, David Johansen, and Megan Fox following an invisible woman who must find her way back with the help of the one man who can see her.

programme.title: Queen of Outer Space
programme.desc: American astronauts are drawn by a mysterious force to the planet Venus, which they find to be inhabited only by beautiful women and their despotic queen.

programme.title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape
programme.desc: Gilbert feels trapped - with no father present and an eccentric family to care for, he is struggling to cope. Despite the hardships Gilbert perseveres, but will he be able to live his own life?

programme.title: My All American
programme.desc: Freddie Steinmark, an underdog on the gridiron, faces the toughest challenge of his life after leading his team to a championship season.

programme.title: The Librarian: Quest for the Spear
programme.desc: As a means of finding the legendary book known as the Key of Solomon, Flynn pairs with a brainy archaeologist to first acquire the map legend. Unfortunately, they must elude the sinister General Samir and the ulterior plans of Flynn's uncle.

programme.title: George And The Dragon
programme.desc: A knight (James Purefoy, "Rome") returning from the Crusades takes on a dragon after the disappearance of the kindly Princess Lunna (Piper Perabo, "Coyote Ugly"). With Patrick Swayze.

programme.title: Timeline: Timeline
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.

programme.title: The Librarian: Quest for the Spear
programme.desc: As a means of finding the legendary book known as the Key of Solomon, Flynn pairs with a brainy archaeologist to first acquire the map legend. Unfortunately, they must elude the sinister General Samir and the ulterior plans of Flynn's uncle.

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: Set in 1968, a German Shepherd enrolled by his family in a training program that will send him to serve American soldiers in Vietnam. Even when Rain is wounded, he saves many, and bonds with a soldier who learns much from this very special dog.

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: When Nathan (Taylor Lautner) discovers the parents who raised him aren't his real folks, he begins to uncover unsettling secrets that trigger events and leave him running for his life.

programme.title: The Battle of Midway: Dauntless
programme.desc: A U.S. carrier group is positioned off the coast of Midway in June 1942. During the battle, the two-man crew of a U.S. Navy dive bomber is forced to ditch in the sea. Amid the vast openness of the Pacific, the men are forced to face their own mortality.

programme.title: Jack Hunter: And The Lost Treasure of Ugarit
programme.sub-title: And The Lost Treasure of Ugarit
programme.desc: Young archaeologist Jack Hunter refuses to join his mentor, Professor Shaffer, who believes a poem is a coded treasure map, on a relic hunt, until his friend is murdered to steal it. The suspect is a Syrian artifact trader so he flies to Damascas.

programme.title: Redline
programme.desc: Starring Eddie Griffin and Nathan Phillips. With the speedometer maxed out, a group of exotic car fanatics hit the streets in hopes of winning a life-changing sum of 24 million dollars. Every rule is broken as these drivers.

programme.title: Finding Mrs. Claus
programme.desc: When Mrs. Claus (Mira Sorvino) feels neglected by her less than attentive husband (Will Sasso), she goes to Las Vegas to help a little girl with her Christmas wish.

programme.title: Defending Santa
programme.desc: A small-town sheriff finds a man asleep in the woods who claims to be Santa Claus.

programme.title: You Can’t Fight Christmas
programme.desc: Interior designer Leslie Major loves all things Christmas. When she meets handsome Edmund James, she quickly learns he thinks the festivities are frivolous and superficial.

programme.title: The Santa Trap
programme.desc: Santa Claus winds up in jail after a 7-year-old sets a trap in order to prove his existence to her family.

programme.title: The Christmas Sitters
programme.desc: Facing holiday flight delays, two parents double-book incompatible babysitters: the mother's lawyer friend, Nora, and the dad's half-brother, Max, to look after their kids. An attraction grows and it seems a Christmas miracle might be on the cards.

programme.title: A Christmoose Story
programme.desc: A large moose crashes through the roof of young Max's garage! A moose who talks! A moose who claims to work for Santa!

programme.title: The Bachelor Next Door
programme.desc: A newly engaged couple becomes intrigued by the young stranger who moves in next door. He's handsome, friendly and very helpful, but he's no stranger.

programme.title: My Family's Secret
programme.desc: Starring Nicholle Tom and Dylan Neal. When Lara starts to investigate the attempted suicide of her husband and sister-in-law, she is led to his mentally ill brother, Grady - and finds herself in grave danger.

programme.title: Her Son’s Secret
programme.desc: Sarah has never given up. Having lost her son Matt 13 years ago – presumed drowned and the body never recovered -- she still keeps her hopes up. One day, Matt shows up at Sarah’s door.

programme.title: Lethal Beauty
programme.desc: A pretty, successful masseuse and spa owner pays the price for being a good Samaritan when the young woman she helps turns out to be a ruthless killer.

programme.title: The Wrong Mother
programme.desc: Kelsey Larsen’s dream finally came true: beautiful twins from an in vitro procedure. But when Kelsey needs home care, the nurse she hires is none other than the egg donor herself — and the crazy woman has come to claim "her babies"!

programme.title: Sugar Baby Murder
programme.desc: After graduating from college, 21 year old Bridget moves to a new town with her best friend Lindsay. Desperately needing a job to support her budding writing career, she takes a job as an EA to business tycoon Anthony Gloss.

programme.title: A Sister’s Obsession
programme.desc: Kendra’s life couldn’t be more perfect – she has a loving husband, supportive best friend, and a blossoming career… and she was just awarded the title of "Educator of the Year.(n)

programme.title: The Legend of Hercules
programme.desc: Exiled and sold into slavery because of a forbidden love, Hercules (Kellan Lutz) must use his formidable powers to fight his way back to his rightful kingdom.

programme.title: The Princess Bride
programme.desc: A storybook stableboy turns pirate (Cary Elwes) and rescues his beloved (Robin Wright), who is about to marry a dreadful prince.

programme.title: Hoodwinked Too! Hood vs. Evil
programme.desc: Red Riding Hood, who is training with the covert Sister Hoods group, is called upon, along with the Wolf, to look into the sudden disappearance of Hansel and Gretel.

programme.title: The Princess Bride
programme.desc: A storybook stableboy turns pirate (Cary Elwes) and rescues his beloved (Robin Wright), who is about to marry a dreadful prince.

programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: The unusual romance between a zombie (Nicholas Hoult) and a living woman (Teresa Palmer) sets in motion a series of events that may transform the entire lifeless world.
A writer (John Cusack) who specializes in debunking supernatural phenomena experiences true terror when he spends a night in a reputedly haunted room of a hotel.

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: After warning them of the dangers of the city, two traildrivers are shanghaied shortly after the Ponderosa cattle herd arrives in San Francisco.

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: Virginia City is overrun by criminals in the form of a protection racket. Citizens must pay or they'll suffer an "accident".

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The son of a rancher is trying to sell land for mining, the Cartwrights fear this could jeopardise a standing agreement.

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: A boy's mother dies and father is in prison, the Cartwrights step in to look after the boy until the uncle comes to claim him.

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: A former dance hall girl poses as a Spanish heiress to claim a land grant, the Cartwrights try to fight the claim.

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their ranch while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their ranch while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their ranch while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their ranch while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: Hoss helps ex army scout Charlie Trent (the towns drunk) regain his self-esteem, by volunteering him to lead Captain Pender's men across the desert with a valuable shipment.

programme.title: Knucklehead
programme.desc: After incurring a large debt with a local criminal ringleader, Eddie Sullivan creates a get-rich-quick scheme and enlists a gentle giant named Walter as his unwitting accomplice.

programme.title: Pants On Fire
programme.desc: Fifteen-year-old Jack Parker uses white lies to gain favor and to get out of trouble until his lies start coming true throwing his life into chaos.

programme.title: Ice Girls
programme.desc: A 15-year-old figure skating champion leaves the sport after her mother loses her job and the family moves to a small town. She struggles to fit in until the owner of a local skating arena helps her fulfill her true potential.

programme.title: Black or White
programme.desc: A heart-wrenching drama starring Academy Award Winners Octavia Spencer and Kevin Costner. When Elliot is left to care for his granddaughter Eloise by himself, Eloise’s paternal grandmother seeks custody, drawing them into a long and uncertain battle.

programme.title: Heaven Must Wait
programme.desc: An American inherits an old village church in England, where treasure is buried. Greedy Mr. Slee scents his opportunity to snatch the treasure. Diggity, a little cherub trying to earn his wings, helps uncover the treasure for the benefit of the village.

programme.title: A Horse Story
programme.desc: Monican hevonen Champion murtaa hevosten perinteen ja paljastaa, että hevoset osaavat puhua. Monica auttaa sitä selvittämään, minkälainen hevonen se haluaa olla isona. Samalla Monicalle selviää oikea tie elämässä.

programme.title: Keep The Aspidistra Flying
programme.desc: When successful advertiser, Gordon Comstock (Richard E. Grant), abruptly walks away from his career to pursue his dream of being a poet, his path is much more difficult than expected and soon financial problems begin to pile up.

programme.title: She's Funny That Way
programme.desc: A married Broadway director falls for a call-girl-turned-actress and works to help her advance her career, but things get a little more complicated than they bargained for.

programme.title: You Stupid Man
programme.desc: A writer struggles to deal with the break-up with his girlfriend. It does not help with getting her out of his mind that she recently became a famous TV start.

programme.title: The Heist
programme.desc: A comedy centered on three museum security guards who devise a plan to steal back the artworks to which they have become attached after they are transferred to another museum. Starring: Morgan Freeman, Christopher Walken, Joseph McKenna, Wynn Everett.

programme.title: The Steal
programme.desc: When villainous London bankers plunder desperately-needed money from the Third World, a female computer hacker is hired to get it back. A tale of kidnapping, computer fraud and Morris Minors.

programme.title: Funny Money
programme.desc: When Henry Perkins accidentally trades his briefcase with a man, he finds five million dollars inside. However, the cash draws in Mr. Big, who wants to reclaim his money.

programme.title: House of Secrets
programme.desc: The Paris Police recruit the officer of an English ship to help trap counterfeiters by joining them.

programme.title: Hunted
programme.desc: An unusual relationship develops between a fugitive killer and a runaway orphan on an odyssey across England.

programme.title: One Jump Ahead
programme.desc: Intrepid British reporters attempt to stay ahead of the authorities as they track a killer and a child witness.

programme.title: One Way Out
programme.desc: A policeman risks his career when he accepts a bribe to keep his daughter from being implicated in a robbery.

programme.title: The Riddle of the Sands
programme.desc: Two former British school friends take to the high seas to thwart a German invasion of Britain in 1901.

programme.title: The Upturned Glass
programme.desc: Suspenseful psychological thriller about a prosperous British brain surgeon who plots to murder the woman responsible for the death of the girl he loved.

programme.title: To the Public Danger
programme.desc: Four people meet in a pub and enjoy alcohol fuelled thrill seeking until things get out of hand and each person faces a moral choice with long-lasting consequences.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Gypsy Jigsaw
programme.desc: Sydney receives a deck of rare Tarot cards from her recently deceased friend. The infamous, previously unmentioned Vulture was after him. Sydney enlists Claudia to help.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Three Rivers to Cross
programme.desc: According to local monks, the Famed Jade Empress is hidden in the valley that will be flooded when the Three Rivers Dam's flood gates have their grand opening.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Lost Contact
programme.desc: Sydney, Nigel and billionaire entrepreneur Rod Thorson parachute into the Myanmar jungle to rescue a relic-hunting team hired by Thorson to locate an ancient sacrificial bowl.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Cross of Voodoo
programme.desc: When two graduate students on the trail of the Haitian Cross of Utu disappear in New Orleans, Sydney and Nigel go down on the bayou to find them.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel are on a trip, so Claudia decides to help Sydney's friend Roger to find Julius Caesar's armor, but relic hunting is not her talent.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Reel Thing
programme.desc: Working as consultants for an archeology adventure film, Sydney and Nigel realize the Pharaoh Amun II's props are genuine, long-thought lost relics. How can they be?

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Kate (REDUX)
programme.desc: After the Trans-Utopian collides with a mine, Percy, unhappy with Caravaggio's recent crisis performance, creates a female Al program with more intuition, but it quickly develops too much independence... and an attraction to Travis.

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Rivals (REDUX)
programme.desc: Callie's irritation with the Trans-Utopian's ongoing technical problems is aggravated when the sleek bounty hunting ship Seattle and its debonair captain rescue the crew from a problem. They owe him, but the whole situation doesn't feel right.

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Heir and the Spare (REDUX)
programme.desc: The crew arrest a con-man preying on older women. But the prisoner has a dark secret and a genetic link to Marcus. Meanwhile, Percy's secret parallel search for Dante begins to wear on her; we fear for the consequences to her health and judgement.

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Just Politics (REDUX)
programme.desc: Rudolfo becomes suspicious of a trade minister the Trans-Utopian is transport­ing to the Manheim Asteroid Belt to clinch a deal. Rudolfo will benefit from the deal, but it may be too good to be true.

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Negative Energy (REDUX)
programme.desc: Marcus believes he can convert the Trans-Utopian's hyper drive with negative energy instead of antimatter, rendering it safer, but hey will need Durenium to test it. He seeks a seller of this rare and - in some orbits - illegal, element.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Three extraterrestrials who pose a serious threat to humanity target Shalimar, so the team sets out to save her from their evil clutches.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: A disembodied mutant takes over the bodies of various people and sets out to go after the ones who did this to him. One of them is a doctor that Shalimar likes.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: While on a job, Shalimar is injured and is helped by another feral mutant, Nikki, whom she knew and was almost chosen for the team. While Shalimar recuperates, she offers to fill in.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Brennan's shady ex-girlfriend turns to him for help when her latest scam takes a deadly turn.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Pandora's Box
programme.desc: While Boone is haunted by hallucinations of captain Lucas Johnson, the Taelon Rho'ha is to undergo a experiment of experiencing human emotions.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: If You Could Read my Mind
programme.sub-title: If You Could Read my Mind
programme.desc: The Taelon Commonality is invaded and psychic Katya Petrenko is the prime suspect. She tells Boone she knows about his secret activities and needs him.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Wrath of Achilles
programme.desc: The resistance releases a virus of Augur on the Taelon headquarters in Washington. Things get out of hand.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Devil You Know
programme.desc: While a dying colonel implants his brain in a deceased criminal, the Taelons show a new electromagnetic pulse weapon. Jonathan Doors wishes to acquire it.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Law and Order
programme.desc: The Synod agrees to let Rho'ha be charged with murder in a human court. He will be prosecuted by Joshua Doors, the son of Jonathan Doors.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: A new inter-dimensional portal system for human travel turns out to be something more when the resistance discover a CVI in a boy who got lost in the system.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Infection
programme.desc: Ne'eg is killed by a bacteria that is both deadly to Taelons and Humans. If it spreads, it might be disastrous. A new racist group attacks a community center.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Destruction
programme.desc: The Liberation sends a team to destroy the scarecrow probe before the Taelons crack it. Joshua Doors is appointed as secretary of Human-Taelon relations.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ice, Ice, Baby
programme.desc: Ton and Allen have to get aggressive when they encounter a towering opponent with a mountain of cash. The guys uncover a vintage ice resurfacing machine and an Olympic biathlon rifle!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Top Gun Ton
programme.desc: Scale RC Viper FanJet aircraft with a potent jet engine; 1920s Gundlach Korona large format field camera used for photography expeditions. Ton pilots a plane, but crashes and burns.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Chi-Town Showdown
programme.desc: Metal Victorian-era burial casket; 1870s glass fire extinguisher grenades; a mechanical 1896 handcrafted Chicago fire station alarm box.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Miami Heat
programme.desc: All-terrain Air Commander Hovercraft, a 1970s NASA countdown clock and a one-of-a-kind 1960s Delta Relay rocket.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Quadzilla Attacks!
programme.desc: Extreme Quadzilla ATV, the fastest 4 wheeler ever; a 1910s Remington Derringer and an 1880s Palm Squeezer pistol; revolutionary 1800s Western Electric telephone with a crank dial.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Smoking Ton
programme.desc: WW2 Stuart M3 tank barrel and heavy duty tank treads; rare, collectors' 1890 silver inlayed humidor; high-end industrial meat slicer in the ultimate restaurant unit.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Friends in Hawaii Places
programme.desc: Allen &Ton enlist an assistant, Carolyn, and Allen's Hawaiian buddy, Junior, to help them battle local buyers. The guys find a WWII-era motor scooter and a stash of antique Polynesian tattoo tools that get used on Ton!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Diesel Digs
programme.desc: The guys head to the industrial hub of LA to score some heavy machinery and unearth a 1981 Bobcat 743 Frontloader, one of the first powered by a diesel engine and a trench-defending WWI German Sturmtrupp helmet bashing mace.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Hot Commodity
programme.desc: Allen is late to the auction, leaving Ton to battle a feisty female auction buyer on his own! The guys find a fully functional flamethrower and a rare hand-carved bow and arrow set from South America!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Night of the Digging Dead
programme.desc: A custom-built shark cage; 1900s pathologist's dissection toolkit; 1940s embalming pump and one of the first electric bone saws.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Strat'ed for Cash
programme.desc: On a limited budget in the historic L.A. neighborhood of West Adams, Allen and Ton still win three lockers and find a Maui Blue Fender Stratocaster and a 1930s Schwinn bike.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Half Pipe Dreams
programme.desc: 1970s Z-Flex Jimmy Plumer Poolrider skateboard with artwork by Doug Smith; Kevlar bulletproof vest, ballistic facemask and a helmet used by S.W.A.T. teams; a pair of 1990s racing pocket bikes capable of going 80 mph.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Choo-Choo, Cha-Ching!
programme.desc: Ton and Allen get a surprise second chance after nearly getting shut out in the small town of Palmer. They uncover a motorized railroad maintenance car from the 1960's and a pre-WWI Japanese semi-automatic pistol.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Everything's Bigger in Texas
programme.desc: Winchester 1886 rifle invented to kill buffalo; collection of 1950s electric Slot Cars.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Drumming Up Cash
programme.desc: Ton & Allen face some silent but deadly competition at an auction in nearby Glendale. They discover a Zildjian brand percussion cymbal from the 1940's and a pyrotechnics control board designed for large-scale fireworks displays!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Allen's Got Balls
programme.desc: After returning to LA, Ton & Allen head deep into hostile auction hunter territory and butt heads with a familiar old foe! They discover a driving range golf ball picker vehicle and one of the most accurate rifles ever made!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fake Punt Payoff
programme.desc: Ton and Allen contend with a large crowd of inexperienced auction-buyers at a huge storage container auction in Pasadena. They find a small fleet of Segway personal transporters and an enormous custom-made shotgun.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Shuffle
programme.desc: Ton and Allen teach a cocky new auction hunter a lesson. They spot a 1940's-era shuffleboard table and uncover an early hot rod made from the fuel tank of a WWII fighter plane!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Big Score
programme.desc: At a climate-controlled storage facility in downtown L.A., Allen and Ton's locker wins score them an antique cash register and a German H&K pistol prized by collectors.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Allen's Ruff Day
programme.desc: Ton and Allen head to an auction in Ton's hometown and end up battling with a big-mouthed buyer. They discover a pair of tranquilizer dart guns and also end up fighting with a K9!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hula Moola
programme.desc: Ton and Allen jet to the Hawaiian islands where they're joined by a feisty new female assistant! The team uncovers a pair of James Bond-style gadgets designed for high-speed underwater travel and a vintage sled.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gold 'n' Gloves
programme.desc: The Auction Hunters team goes toe-to-toe with Ton's evil twin! They find a medieval catapult designed for storming castles and Ton uncovers a hidden collection of gold bars worth thousands of dollars!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Mr. Haff Goes to Washington
programme.desc: Ton and Allen invade the Nation's capital, but meet strong resistance from local bidders. The guys uncover a Civil War era black powder revolver and a stash of South African gold coins!(n)
